neg review:
Rooms are rather dated.. entrance and hallways have been updone.
SubSaharian waterpressure in the shower. Very slow and inconsistent WIFI. Small parking garage, no intercom, pricy

pos review: The room was big, clean and very comfortable. I loved the bed very very comfortable. The staff was helpful and kind.
neg review: Due to covid regulations There was no buffet offered at the premises for safety measures.

pos review:
Good parking for my bike
And just off the ring road
Specious and comfortable room, very friendly staff and lovely garden at the back.

neg review: Quite warm bedrooms. No possibility to open windows

The staff member at the reception was very rude. We were with a little baby of one month, and even with rooms available, they didn't check-in us by the moment we arrived. We had to changed him in the middle of reception. Very bad experience.  The breakfast also was below expectations.

pos review: Practical as not too far from the wilrijkse plein
